:root{--main-white:#f0f0f0;--main-gray:#303841;--main-red:#be3144;--main-cyan:#0ff}*{margin:0;padding:0}*,:after,:before{box-sizing:inherit}html{box-sizing:border-box;font-size:62.5%;scroll-behavior:smooth}body{font-family:Poppins,sans-serif;font-size:1.8rem;font-weight:400;line-height:1.4;color:var(--main-white)}h1,h2{font-family:Raleway,sans-serif;font-weight:700;text-align:center}ul{list-style:none}a{text-decoration:none;color:var(--main-white)}img{display:block;width:45%}@media (max-width:75em){html{font-size:60%}}@media (max-width:61.25em){html{font-size:58%}}@media (max-width:28.75em){html{font-size:55%}}#navbar,.nav-list{background-color:var(--main-gray)}.nav-list{height:10vh;display:flex;width:50%;justify-content:space-around;align-items:center;margin-left:auto;list-style:none}.nav-links{text-decoration:none;color:var(--main-white);font-size:18px}.about,.contact,.home,.showwork,.work{height:90vh;position:absolute;width:100%}.home-content{height:100%;display:flex;justify-content:space-evenly;align-items:center}.home-content 0,#7873f5)}.icons{margin-right:5rem}.icon,.icons{justify-content:center}.icon{list-style:none;padding-left:0;display:flex;width:100%;max-width:980px;margin-top:4rem;flex-wrap:wrap}.icon a{color:var(--main-white)}.about-content{height:100%;display:flex;justify-content:space-evenly;align-items:center}.about-content img{height:50%;width:50%;margin-left:-25rem}.about-content h1{font-size:25px;margin:30px 0;color:var(--main-white)}.about-content h3{font-size:18px;color:var(--main-white)}.about-content p{font-size:14px;color:var(--main-gray)}.about-content span{margin-left:25rem;padding:10px;color:var(--main-gray)}.about{background-image:linear-gradient(0deg,#fbc2eb 0,#a6c1ee)}.skills{height:55rem;margin-left:-55rem;margin-top:-7rem;width:89rem;padding:3px}article{padding:10px;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(320px,1fr))}.content{width:65rem;margin-left:-10rem}.work{background-image:linear-gradient(-225deg,#69eacb,#eaccf8 48%,#6654f1)}.work h2{color:var(--main-gray)}.footer-section{bottom:10rem}footer{border-top:4px solid var(--main-white)}.showwork{background-image:linear-gradient(-225deg,#ff3cac,#562b7c 52%,#2b86c5)}.projects-section{text-align:center;padding:1rem 2rem;background:var(--main-blue)}.projects-section-header{max-width:640px;margin:0 auto 6rem;border-bottom:.2rem solid var(--main-white)}@media (max-width:28.75em){.projects-section-header{font-size:4rem}}.projects-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(300px,1fr));grid-gap:4rem}.projects-grid,.projects-grid-all{display:grid;width:100%;max-width:1280px;margin:0 1rem}.projects-grid{grid-template-columns:1fr}}.project{background:var(--main-gray);box-shadow:1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.5);border-radius:2px}.code{color:var(--main-gray);transition:color .3s ease-out}.project:hover .code{color:coral}.project-image{height:calc(100% - 6.8rem);width:75%;object-fit:cover;margin-left:5rem;padding:1rem}.project-title{font-size:wrem;padding:1rem .5rem}.viewbtn{margin-top:-5%;padding:2rem}.btn{display:inline-block;padding:1rem 2rem;border-radius:2px}.btn-show-all{font-size:2rem;background:var(--main-gray);transition:background .3s ease-out}.contact{background-image:linear-gradient(-225deg,#2cd8d5,#c5c1ff
